Package compiler

Class ErrorListener

java.lang.Object
org.antlr.v4.runtime.BaseErrorListener
compiler.ErrorListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.antlr.v4.runtime.ANTLRErrorListener
public class ErrorListener
extends org.antlr.v4.runtime.BaseErrorListener
ErrorListener class that is used to collect errors detected during scanning, parsing and elaboration.
Author:
Karolis Butkus

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrors()
    Returns the (possibly empty) list of errors collected by the listener.

    Indicates if the listener has collected any errors.

    void throwException()
    Throws an exception if any errors were reported; does nothing otherwise.
    void visitError​(org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token token, java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... args)
    Adds an error message during the tree visit stage.
